title: Nominal GDP rises, money demand rises

content.question: The demand curve for money shifts to the right when

choices.label: the nominal gross domestic product increases
the real gross domestic product decreases

content.answer: the nominal gross domestic product increases

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
